original_text: They have no leader or ruler, 8 but they get their food during the summer. At the time of harvest they store food to prepare for winter.
korean_text: 개미는 두령도 없고 감독자도 없고 통치자도 없으되

sentences.original_text: They have no leader or ruler
but they get their food during the summer
they store food to prepare for winter
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 겨울을 준비하기 위해 음식을 저장합니다
